steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 4-2011. A 4-year-old 
boy with back pain and hypercalcemia.
El Saleeby CM(1), Grottkau BE, Friedmann AM, Westra SJ, Sohani AR.

Author information:
(1)Division of Pediatric Hospital Medicine and Infectious Diseases, Department 
of Pediatrics, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA.
